ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bow for bards!
ygData.msgSnippet: very nice, grats.  and someone told me it looked like a rusty short sword. not quite, that thing is massive.  i d really like either the 10/21 tishan s clash
ygData.messageBody:
very nice, grats. and someone told me it looked like a rusty short sword.
not quite, that thing is massive. i'd really like either the 10/21 tishan's
clash or 11/23 symphonic harmony bard weps to replace the maestro ones.
those just make my mouth water. of course that's what i said about yaks,
then about the maestro weps, now this... will it never end? at least
singing steel is not all that great compared to imbrued, i have a feeling it
is going to be harder to get a full set.

Shada Powa, L53 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> Heh, thanks.
>
> Sionachie's Partisan
> Magic Lore
> Skill: Piercing Atk Delay: 19
> Damage: 9
> Cha +6, Int +2, sv Magic +5
> Wt. 1.8
> Bard / All
